plugins.name: Heron variable tools
plugins.description:
Heron variable tools can help you manage variables efficiently.


Learn more here:

üëâüèª https://heronhq.com/variable-tools


üéâ Now you can import or update palette variables from https://huetone.ardov.me


Fix raw values as variables

Set rules like using "Spacing/anyName" variables for auto-layout padding, click "Fix Variables", and it'll auto-bind all unbound values - works for text & effect styles too. Try it out! ‚ú®


Import variables from libraries

Import variables from your favorite libraries so you can create your theme based on these palettes. For now we support Tailwindcss, Chakra UI, Radix UI, MUI and Ant design.


Import and export design token format module

Import and export variables by JSON file, based on the Design Token Format Module. You can copy variables from one file to another.


Bulk editing variables' scoping

Select variables, then edit their color scoping, number scoping or if hiding from publishing. This will save lots of time for you.


Bulk editing code syntax by convention

You can select a naming convention and apply it to multiple variables. Heron variable tools will add code syntax for every variable based on the naming convention and their name. Now we support 7 types of convention.

  1. CSS variable: var(--text-color)
  2. SASS variable: $text-color
  3. LESS variable: @text-color
  4. Upper camel case: TextColor
  5. Lower camel case: textColor
  6. Upper snake case: TEXT_COLOR
  7. Lower snake case: text_color


Bulk renaming variables

Bulk renaming variables' name or changing naming style.


Generate color guide

Generate color guide from your local color variables automatically.


Create/Update variables from guide

Create or update color variables from your color guide. Manage color values and descriptions in Figma canvas.


Copy and paste variables

Copy variables, paste them in another collection or file.


Swap styles to variables

Swap your old styles to new variables with the same name. Support ignoring style prefix.

accepted.name: Hal Lee
accepted.description: keep curious. https://heronhq.com

plugins.name: Anitype ¬∑ Text animation
plugins.description:
The plugin animates any text layers in Figma using predefined presets. Select any frame -> select the preset, and that's it!


No need to learn complex software or even typography theory. We've hand-crafted presets using the best industry standards.


Under the hood it uses the Aninix animation engine.


FEATURES


  1. Empower your presentations and prototypes by importing animations directly into Figma (Anitype uses native Figma prototypes for it);
  2. Simplify developer handoffs by exporting lottie and animations specs;
  3. Speed up video creation with exports to mp4, webm and gif.

Version 1.2.48 
Today, we released the "Link" function for Figma. And we added the Replace and Replace all feature. 
"Link": 
The link panel allows you to check your Dropbox, Box.com, Google Drive, and all other Systems if the Images are newer than the ones in your Figma. This is the easiest way to ensure your design is consistent or update the design with the latest images. 

"Replace/Replace all":
Imagine you have a design and use some images in multiple places. And now you need to replace it because there is a newer version. Did it take it more than 10 seconds to fix this? Now, this is the time it takes. That's it. 

Try it.

plugins.name: Cleaner
plugins.description:
Cleaner works within the selection or on the current page.


Features

  1. Remove unused properties
  2. Remove unused layers
  3. Remove hidden components (and instances)
  4. Remove auto-layout
  5. Remove guides
  6. Ungroup single-layer groups
  7. Rename layers
  8. Skip locked layers
  9. List and remove unused styles
  10. Auto-save last settings


------------------------------------------


Remove unused properties

  1. Any fill, stroke, effect, and grid that has visibility set to "hidden" will be deleted.
  2. This will also remove the fills that do not affect on resultant color.


Remove unused layers

  1. Any layer that has visibility set to "hidden" will be deleted.
  2. This will also remove empty layers. Layers with interactions will be ignored.


Remove hidden components

  1. Any component or instance that has visibility set to "hidden" will be deleted.


Ungroup single-layer groups

  1. Any group that has only one child will be ungrouped.
  2. Groups with blend modes, effects, interactions, or export settings will be ignored.


Rename layers

  1. Non-descriptive layer names, such as "Rectangle 12 copy" will be renamed.
  2. Text layer names will be replaced with their content.
  3. Components, instances, and layers with export settings will be ignored.


Remove auto-layout

  1. This will remove "auto-layout" from single-element frames.


Remove guides

  1. Remove guides within the selection or on the current page.


Skip locked layers

  1. Locked layers will be ignored.


List unused styles in the document

  1. Unused styles will be listed in the 'Styles' tab with their names and types.


Feel free to give any feedback and request.


Support me: Buy me a coffee


---

plugins.name: Text Utilities
plugins.description:
Split, normalize, and bulk copy and paste text layers.


Bulk Edit Text

Automatically propagate edits to all identical text layers.


Bulk Copy Text

Copy the text within the selected text layers to the clipboard.


Bulk Paste Text

Paste the contents of the clipboard onto the selected text layers.


Copy for Spreadsheet

Copy the text within the selected text layers to the clipboard, formatted for pasting into a spreadsheet.


Find and Replace

Find and replace text in text layers within the selection or on the current page.


Split Text Layers by Line

Split each selected text layer into separate text layers that each contain a single line.


Normalize Text Style

Set the style of each selected text layer to follow that of each layer‚Äôs first character.


Reset Text Layer Names

Set the name of the selected text layers to follow their text content.

37287.name: Text Utilities
37287.description:
Split, normalize, and bulk copy and paste text layers.


Bulk Edit Text

Automatically propagate edits to all identical text layers.


Bulk Copy Text

Copy the text within the selected text layers to the clipboard.


Bulk Paste Text

Paste the contents of the clipboard onto the selected text layers.


Copy for Spreadsheet

Copy the text within the selected text layers to the clipboard, formatted for pasting into a spreadsheet.


Find and Replace

Find and replace text in text layers within the selection or on the current page.


Split Text Layers by Line

Split each selected text layer into separate text layers that each contain a single line.


Normalize Text Style

Set the style of each selected text layer to follow that of each layer‚Äôs first character.


Reset Text Layer Names

Set the name of the selected text layers to follow their text content.

plugins.name: Hey Figma Speech Recognition
plugins.description:
Let you insert a text from your voice using speech recognition. Click Open Voice > Start Speaking to start the speech recognition. Once finished, it will automagically add text into the plugin. Click add text to add it on the canvas.

How it works:

- It will open a new browser window, because Figma doesn't have permission for microphone.
- The web app will recognize your voice locally in your browser using webkit SpeechRecognition, so you need to use modern browser
- Lastly, it will send the text result back to the plugin via web socket

Supported language: English

accepted.name: Sonny Lazuardi
accepted.description: Building design plugins, prototypes, and apps

plugins.name: Componentizer
plugins.description:
Magically turn frames into components.


Clean up those messy design files with a single click. Componentizer automatically matches similar layers and converts them to components for you. Here's how it works:


Finds Matching Frames

Automatically runs through your entire document to find frames matching your selection. Or have it process every frame in the document.


Creates and Swaps for Component Instances

Creates a component and swaps out all matching frames for instances of it.


Applies Overrides

Reduces the number of components needed by finding those that could be recreated by applying overrides to similar components.


Learn more at http://componentizer.design.

plugins.name: LCH
plugins.description:
This simple color picker allows you to use the LCH color space in your designs with ease. The LCH color space is perceptually uniform and significantly simplifies creating and modifying color systems. If you'd like to find out more, check out this great article!


Features

  • Pick colors by adjusting lightness, chroma, hue and alpha levels;
  • Use it in your designs for fills, strokes and gradients;
  • Adjust colors of multiple objects simultaneously using Ctrl (‚åò) and Shift keys;
  • Import/export colors from/to hex, rgb() and lch() CSS strings.


Feedback and troubleshooting

Source code is available at GitHub.


If you have any suggestions or encounter any bugs, feel free to message me at zisest@gmail.com.


Acknowledgements

This plugin was inspired by Lea Verou's color picker available at css.land/lch/.


Conversion logic is by Chris Lilley.

plugins.name: ColorLabels
plugins.description:
This plugin enables you to label your color styles in your Style guide with a single click.


Now, with the latest version of this plugin, you can:

  • Label your color styles with four different color values: HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSB.
  • Label the styles with a unique custom color name imported from the list of colors in Coolors.co.
  • Label them in the [Color Name]/[Tone] format if you have multiple shades of a color. Just Select all your shades and enter the Color Name(Primary, Secondary, Neutral etc. ) The plugin automatically detects the tone of each color and applies it accordingly.

plugins.name: CSS Exporter
plugins.description:
The CSS Exporter is a simple and fast CSS export tool. It can export Local styles and Local variables to a CSS file based on your presets.


Features:

  1. Set Token prefix
  2. Customize Separator
  3. Customize unit, px or rem
  4. Customize color type, hex, rgb, rgba, hsl
  5. Customize export format, css, tailwind, json


The CSS Exporter does not export SCSS, LESS, or other syntaxes. This is because the exported format is CSS variable format, which is applicable to various CSS preprocessor languages. If you need it to export SCSS, LESS, or other formats, please let me know.


If this plugin is helpful to you, remember to come back to this page and give me a "Like". ‚ù§Ô∏è

plugins.name: Status Changer
plugins.description:
Status Changer allows you to easily change the name of the person in charge and the modified date on your own Component set.


HOW TO USE

  1. Install `Status Changer` and run it inside of a project.
  2. Edit the Component Set created for the Status bar.(Note whether the item has been added to Variants.)
  3. Select the Frames, etc. to which you want to add a status bar and run Status Changer.
  4. You can select your own customized component set values, and the status bar(s) will be added when you select and press the SET button.
  5. After changing the status, click "Change user name and modification time." from the plugin in the properties screen on the right.


About Dates and Dates

Multiple country formats are supported, including American and British, Asian, etc.


Sample For January 2, 2022 at 11:03 p.m.


For the British "DD/MM/YY H.mm a" 02/01/22 11.03 pm

For the U.S. "MM-DD-YY H:mm a" 01-02-22 11:03 pm

For the Japan "YYYY/MM/DD HH:mm" 2022/01/02 23:03

Click Here For More Info! 


Caution

Be sure to place it directly below the page.

Do not rename the properties.

32960.name: Status Changer
32960.description:
Status Changer allows you to easily change the name of the person in charge and the modified date on your own Component set.


HOW TO USE

  1. Install `Status Changer` and run it inside of a project.
  2. Edit the Component Set created for the Status bar.(Note whether the item has been added to Variants.)
  3. Select the Frames, etc. to which you want to add a status bar and run Status Changer.
  4. You can select your own customized component set values, and the status bar(s) will be added when you select and press the SET button.
  5. After changing the status, click "Change user name and modification time." from the plugin in the properties screen on the right.


About Dates and Dates

Multiple country formats are supported, including American and British, Asian, etc.


Sample For January 2, 2022 at 11:03 p.m.


For the British "DD/MM/YY H.mm a" 02/01/22 11.03 pm

For the U.S. "MM-DD-YY H:mm a" 01-02-22 11:03 pm

For the Japan "YYYY/MM/DD HH:mm" 2022/01/02 23:03

Click Here For More Info! 


Caution

Be sure to place it directly below the page.

Do not rename the properties.

plugins.name: Generator
plugins.description:
Generator

Generator is a Figma plugin that helps you quickly generate multiple designs with changing data, such as certificates with different names or business cards with different contact information.


Definitions

  • CSV headers: The top row of a CSV file, which contains the names of the data fields.
  • Variables: Text layers or certain text within a text layer that are linked to CSV headers.


Conventions

  • Global variables: Use the '#' symbol to indicate a global variable. For example, to use the 'Email' header as a global variable, name a layer '#Email' (Syntax: #VariableName)
  • Inline variables: Use curly braces ('{}') to indicate an inline variable. For example, to use the 'Email' header as an inline variable, include '#{Email}' within the text of a text layer. (Syntax: #{VariableName})


How to Use

  1. Select a design frame and a text layer containing the CSV data you want to use. You can also use the file upload option to upload a local CSV file. Click next once you‚Äôre done
  2. Select the variables you want to include in your design from the available selection chips.
  3. (Optional) Enable inline variables to replace specific parts of a text layer rather than the whole. Avoid enabling it when unnecessary as it is a time-heavy operation.
  4. Click 'Generate' to create the new frames with the specified text.


Tips

  • Make sure to rename your layers or layer content according to the conventions mentioned above to use variables from the CSV data.
  • Feel free to check out our regularly-updated docs: https://rebrand.ly/generatordocs
  • If you have any further questions or need assistance, join our discord server or our telegram community.


Got more ideas?

Got any features you'd like to have us implement? Send them our way here

plugins.name: Export Kit
plugins.description:
Export Kit is a Figma plugin focused on enhancing design workflow efficiency. It allows you to easily create and manage multiple export presets, enabling one-click export of design assets in various specifications.


üéØ Preset Management

- Create multiple custom preset configurations

- Built-in iOS and Android presets

- Visual preset editing interface

- Support for preset renaming and deletion


üöÄ Batch Export

- One-click export in multiple sizes and formats

- Support for PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF formats

- Flexible file naming and folder organization


üíé Image Optimization

- Smart PNG compression

- Automatic file name conflict prevention

- Automatic ZIP packaging for exported files


üì¶ Getting Started

1. Install Export Kit from the Figma Community

2. Select the layers you want to export

3. Choose or create an export preset

4. Click the export button to complete


üìù Acknowledgments

- PNG compression powered by https://github.com/photopea/UPNG.js - thanks for their great work

- Delete icon designed by [frelayasia](https://www.flaticon.com/authors/frelayasia) from https://www.flaticon.com/

116212.description:
Export Kit is a Figma plugin focused on enhancing design workflow efficiency. It allows you to easily create and manage multiple export presets, enabling one-click export of design assets in various specifications.


üéØ Preset Management

- Create multiple custom preset configurations

- Built-in iOS and Android presets

- Visual preset editing interface

- Support for preset renaming and deletion


üöÄ Batch Export

- One-click export in multiple sizes and formats

- Support for PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF formats

- Flexible file naming and folder organization


üíé Image Optimization

- Smart PNG compression

- Automatic file name conflict prevention

- Automatic ZIP packaging for exported files


üì¶ Getting Started

1. Install Export Kit from the Figma Community

2. Select the layers you want to export

3. Choose or create an export preset

4. Click the export button to complete


üìù Acknowledgments

- PNG compression powered by https://github.com/photopea/UPNG.js - thanks for their great work

- Delete icon designed by [frelayasia](https://www.flaticon.com/authors/frelayasia) from https://www.flaticon.com/

plugins.name: Easy Barcode
plugins.description:
Easy Barcode - Simplify Barcode Generation in Figma


Unlock the power of effortless barcode creation with the "Easy Barcode" Figma plugin. Designed to streamline your workflow, this plugin seamlessly integrates the JsBarcode library to generate and insert barcodes directly into your Figma designs.

Enjoying my free Figma plugin? ‚òï Consider buying me a coffee to fuel future development!


Key Features:


  • Intuitive Interface: The plugin offers a user-friendly interface, making barcode generation a breeze for both beginners and experienced designers.


  • JsBarcode Integration: Built on the reliable JsBarcode library, Easy Barcode ensures high-quality and accurate barcode rendering for various types, including Code128, EAN-13, UPC-A, and more.


  • Customization Options: Tailor your barcodes to suit your design needs. Adjust the size, color, and other parameters easily within the plugin, ensuring a perfect fit for your Figma project.


  • Real-time Preview: Visualize your barcode in real-time as you customize it, allowing you to fine-tune the details and see the changes instantly.


  • Insert Directly into Figma: Say goodbye to manual imports. Easy Barcode seamlessly inserts generated barcodes directly into your Figma canvas, saving you time and effort.


Versatile Use Cases: Whether you're designing product packaging, inventory systems, or event tickets, Easy Barcode is the go-to solution for incorporating barcodes into your Figma designs.

accepted.name: Oussama Touzni
accepted.description: A passionate software developer

plugins.tagline: Fully customizable bar codes

Meet Lil' Pixel Icon, the Lil' tool for creating pixel-perfect icons in a 16x16 grid, all in vector format. With an easy-to-use interface and a focus on simplicity, you'll be crafting icons with precision and style in no time. Embrace the charm of pixel art with Lil' Pixel Icon and make your designs pop-swizz-wow!


Key Features:

  1. 16x16 Grid: Design pixel-perfect icons with ease.
  2. Fully Vector-Based: Scalable designs without quality loss.
  3. Custom Colors: Double-click any palette color to create and save custom shades.
  4. Palettes: Pre-set color palettes, with the option to create and save custom color palettes. Select the Palettes menu, then click on New Palette.
  5. Mirror/Symmetry Mode: Easily create icons with horizontal, vertical, or dual symmetry options.
  6. User-Friendly Interface: Ultra modern and intuitive for quick design.


Give Lil' Pixel Icon a try!

For feedback please ping me @lucchaissac

plugins.name: Readdy
plugins.description:
Readdy is an website builder tool, now you can use this plugin to export to Figma.


How to Use:

https://help.readdy.ai/en/help/articles/4623808-how-to-export-design


FAQ

1.How export Current Page State to Figma CanvasÔºàWhat you currently see in your eyesÔºâ ‚Äîincluding any interactive or dynamically changed content‚Äîdirectly into Figma.


Step 1. Trigger the state of the page to the state you want to export, such as when a pop-up appears or when the second tab is selected.

Step 2. Click the [Export] Button

Step 3. Click Copy

Step 4. Paste to Readdy Figma Plugin


Now, the exact UI state as seen on the page can be exported into Figma.



2.Why can‚Äôt export the whole interactions or prototype to Figma?


Because its canvas is a static canvas, it can‚Äôt play the prototype or interactions.



You can contact us any time: hi@readdy.ai

plugins.name: Selective Surgery
plugins.description:
Super smart batch selection by name, type, component, text content, or visibility.


Selective Surgery is a plugin for Figma that makes bulk editing a breeze. It offers a convenient palette of methods to quickly get your hands on the layers you need. Whenever you find yourself cmd + click'ing, use Selective Surgery instead!


1) Launch the plugin


Use the Plugins > Selective Surgery menu item


or better yet...


Use the quick actions bar (‚åò Command + /). Find Selective Surgery in the list!


2) Choose your operation üî™


‚û§ By Name - select layers by name


üí° Selective Surgery will aggregate all unique names in the current selection scope and provide helpful fuzzy matching.


Conditions:


  • is
  • is not
  • include
  • does not include
  • matches regex



‚û§ By Component - select layers by a specific component instance


üí° The plugin will pull up all unique components used in the current selection scope


Conditions:


  • is
  • is not


‚û§ By Type - select layers by their native Figma type


Conditions:


  • is
  • is not


Figma Types:


  • Text
  • Rectangle
  • Line
  • Ellipse
  • Image
  • Group
  • Frame
  • Component
  • Component Instance
  • Vector
  • Polygon
  • Union
  • Subtract
  • Intersect
  • Exclude
  • Star
  • Slice


‚û§ By Text Content - select objects by text contents


Conditions:


  • is
  • is not
  • include
  • does not include
  • matches regex


‚û§ By Visibility - select layers by whether they are hidden or shown


Conditions:


  • is
  • is not



3) Do something with your selection!


Examples:


  • Bulk update text styles across deeply nested layers
  • Concurrently paste the same things into multiple frames
  • Blast all the pesky hidden layers in your DS that slow everything down
  • Skillfully rename all those pesky Frame 134081 copies
  • ...or any normal design task you might do in Figma


-----

Made @ Free Association
plugins.tagline: Super smart batch selection.

Examples:


  • Bulk update text styles across deeply nested layers

plugins.name: Superposition
plugins.description:
Extract all design tokens from websites and use them directly in Figma. 

The plugin works with the free Superposition desktop application available at https://superposition.design

The Superposition desktop app intelligently parses your web page for colors, font styles, images and more, then makes them available for export as CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, Android XML and lets you use it directly in Design tools like Figma.

To use with Figma, open Superposition and go to the URL you want to get design tokens from, then open the plugin in Figma. The plugin will be kept up-to-date with the app as long as the app is open.

Unlock the magic of colors with Shades! üé®


Shades is the ultimate Figma plugin designed for designers who want to create stunning color palettes effortlessly. Whether you're working on a fresh design or fine-tuning an existing one, Shades uses AI to generate beautiful, well-balanced palettes tailored to your needs.


üåü Key Features:

AI-Generated Color Palettes ‚Äì Just describe your project, and Shades will suggest the perfect palette for you.

Color Theory-Based Palettes ‚Äì Generate color palettes based on complementary, analogous, triadic, and other color wheel theories right inside Figma.

Customizable Shades & Tints ‚Äì Choose the exact number of shades and tints to fine-tune your palette.

Save to Styles & Variables ‚Äì Easily store your colors in your project's styles or variables for seamless workflow.

Export for Presentations ‚Äì Get color exports ready for your project presentations in no time.

Access Recent AI Palettes ‚Äì Quickly revisit the latest palettes generated by AI for easy reference.

üöÄ How It Works:

Generate a Palette ‚Äì Describe your project or page, and let Shades do the rest.

Use the Color Wheel ‚Äì Experiment with different color theories (complementary, analogous, triadic, etc.) to create your own custom palette.

Explore & Customize ‚Äì Browse through AI-generated palettes or tweak them based on color theory.

Import to Figma ‚Äì With just one click, bring your chosen palette directly into Figma.

Shades is your go-to tool for crafting visually stunning and harmonious designs‚Äîeffortless, fast, and smart!

plugins.name: Auto Constraints
plugins.description:
Apply constraints layout automatically based on and object's placement within parent frame. Similar to how Adobe XD handles constraints in "Responsive Resize: Auto" mode.


For Example, a node in the top right corner of a frame will automatically receive Top, Right constraints.


Commands

Auto Constrain Selection: apply Auto Constraints to the selected object

Frame and Auto Constrain Selection: Frame the selected objects and auto constrain to the new frame

Ungroup and Auto Constrain Selection: Ungroup the selected objects and auto constrain children to the new parent frame

Watch Mode (beta): PluginUI to Auto Constrain Selection whenever object selection changes

  • This applies Auto Constraints to every element as it is selected and as it is deselected.
  • Ignore Selection: Watch Mode will not apply Auto Constraints to this node. Similar to XD's "Responsive Resize: Manual"



Set Keyboard Shortcuts on macOS

Auto Constraint commands mimic native Figma commands for Frame (‚éá‚åòG) and Ungroup (‚áß‚åòG). Setting a keybinding will allow you to replace the native commands with this plugin's version. However, you cannot override native Figma keybindings, only make new ones. My preference is to assign the same patterns to the F key instead of G.


  1. Navigate to: System Preferences > Keyboard > Shortcuts > App Shortcuts > click "+"
  2. Select Application: "Figma.app" and set shortcut for plugin commands by pasting in the "Menu Title" in this format: Plugins->Plugin Name->Plugin Command


  • Auto Constrain Selection: Plugins->Auto Constraints->Selection - ‚åÉF
  • Frame and Auto Constrain Selection: Plugins->Auto Constraints->Frame Selection - ‚éá‚åòF
  • UnGroup and Auto Constrain Selection: Plugins->Auto Constraints->Ungroup Selection - ‚áß‚åòF


Read more on Apple support


---


Report Issues on Github

accepted.name: James Bradford
accepted.description: UX Design & UI Development
